SELECT p.Product_ID, Product_Nm, Gas_ID, pp.Product_Status, Member_Comp_Seq,Product_Price_Seq, Product_Price, Product_Capa, ECount_CD,C.productPriceCount, ( SELECT COUNT(o.Product_Price_Seq) FROM TB_Order_Product o WHERE o.product_id= p.Product_ID AND o.Product_Price_Seq = pp.Product_Price_Seq) productOrderCount, p.Create_ID, p.Create_Dt, p.Update_ID, p.Update_Dt FROM TB_Product p, TB_Product_Price pp, ( SELECT b.Product_ID, count(b.Product_ID) productPriceCount FROM TB_Product a, TB_Product_Price b WHERE a.Product_ID =b.Product_ID AND b.Product_Status != '0' Group By b.Product_ID ) C WHERE p.product_Id =pp.product_Id AND p.product_Id =c.product_Id AND p.Product_Status != '0' AND pp.Product_Status != '0'

SELECT p.Product_ID, pseq Product_Price_Seq,ta.price Product_Price, Product_Nm, Gas_ID, pp.Product_Status, Member_Comp_Seq, Product_Capa, p.Create_ID, p.Create_Dt, p.Update_ID, p.Update_Dt FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT a.product_id pid, a.product_price_seq pseq , a.product_price price FROM tb_product_price a WHERE not exists ( SELECT 1 FROM tb_customer_product_price b WHERE a.Product_ID = b.Product_ID AND a.Product_Price_Seq = b.Product_Price_Seq AND Customer_Id = #{customerId} ) UNION SELECT DISTINCT c.product_id pid, c.product_price_seq pseq, c.product_price price FROM tb_customer_product_price c WHERE customer_id=#{customerId} ) ta, TB_Product p, TB_Product_Price pp WHERE ta.pid= p.product_Id AND p.product_Id =pp.product_Id AND ta.pseq = pp.Product_Price_Seq AND p.Product_Status != '0' AND pp.Product_Status != '0'

SELECT p.Product_ID , Product_Nm , Gas_ID , pp.Product_Status , Member_Comp_Seq , Product_Price_Seq , Product_Price , Product_Capa , p.Create_ID, p.Create_Dt, p.Update_ID, p.Update_Dt FROM TB_Product p, TB_Product_Price pp WHERE p.Product_ID = pp.Product_ID and p.Product_Status != '0' and pp.Product_Status != '0' and p.Product_ID = #{productId} and Product_Price_Seq = #{productPriceSeq}

SELECT p.Product_ID , Product_Nm , Gas_ID , pp.Product_Status , Member_Comp_Seq , pp.Product_Price_Seq , pp.Product_Price , IFNULL(tc.Product_Price,0) Customer_Product_Price , Product_Capa , p.Create_ID, p.Create_Dt, p.Update_ID, p.Update_Dt FROM TB_Product p, TB_Product_Price pp Left Join TB_Customer_Product_Price tc on (pp.Product_ID = tc.Product_ID AND pp.Product_Price_Seq = tc.Product_Price_Seq AND Customer_Id = #{customerId} ) WHERE p.Product_ID = pp.Product_ID and p.Product_Status != '0' and pp.Product_Status != '0' and p.Product_ID = #{productId} and pp.Product_Price_Seq = #{productPriceSeq}
